user_query: a viewer. There were many moments in this movie where in my head I was like good job Joel Edgerton you're giving me the tingles but it's true, he really did a masterful job directing this movie and he wrote the script. This guy's a great talent and he doesn't oversell his acting as well. This is the kind of performance where you could truly fall on your face, you can make yourself look like an idiot, especially since you wrote and directed the thing. It could become one of those performances you're mocked for constantly but gratefully he's so subdued to the point of brilliance in this film where you not only care about him but you are creeped out by him. It's not just that he's this unsettling man, there is a world of pain that you can sense behind his eyes and through the subtleties of his performance and the way he cut this film together you can really feel all of that. Rebecca Hall is also great in this movie, terrific performance, really good work, also a lot of pain behind those eyes. You could really sense that everyone in this movie is damaged in some way, especially Jason Bateman. Got to talk about him because every time I've ever seen Jason Bateman in a movie I've always seen Jason Bateman. I've never seen his character. I think he's a very likable comedic actor but he's never really disappeared into a role for me personally. In this movie this guy vanished. I don't see a shred of Jason Bateman. He gave the best performance of his entire career. He even more so than

entities.entity_description: Joel Edgerton은 이 영화의 감독이자 각본가로, 뛰어난 연출력과 각본 실력을 보여주었다
Joel Edgerton은 이 영화에서 절제된 연기로 관객에게 불안감을 주면서도 공감을 이끌어내는 훌륭한 연기를 선보인 배우이다
Rebecca Hall은 이 영화에서 눈 뒤에 고통이 느껴지는 훌륭한 연기를 보여준 배우이다
Jason Bateman은 이 영화에서 자신의 커리어 최고의 연기를 보여주며 완전히 캐릭터에 몰입한 배우이다

relationships.relationship_description: Joel Edgerton은 이 영화에서 감독, 각본가, 배우로서 다중 역할을 수행했다
Rebecca Hall은 Joel Edgerton이 감독한 영화에 출연했다
Jason Bateman은 Joel Edgerton이 감독한 영화에 출연했다
